content.html:
For moped need glasses dirt in eyes, don’t give passport do deposit
        insread, take photso, check fuel, avoid police stations Phnom Penh
        Killing fields Audio more intimate than group Dress moderately Place
        people enter but never got to leave ‘we too are keepers of memories,
        tell others of what happened so that they may all strive for human
        compassion and peace everywhere today and in generation to come’ Walk in
        silence hard to believe that happened right where you are stood, huge
        part of history, chills in a hot country 1.5-2 hours depends if do extra
        on tape, both had to rewind few times as. Couldn’t comprehend what was
        happening 20 min five by bike to killing fields $4 tuk tuk to S21 from
        hostel, hostel does tour on drive Found hard to rent bikes only hostel
        $7 til 5 Hard to do both in one day but if pushed for time Royal palace,
        says closes at 5 but 4:30 so get there early Billabong best hostel Sort
        out visas, pool, bikes, tours, tuk tuk to airport, lockers, laundry,
        safe storage, good location, food bar Wat langka mediate mon thurs and
        sunday Kampot Poker np 50 cent fee tow waterfall but get water Biek took
        1.5 hours to top, heavy rain, cloud, quicker back, no on maps me as
        name, called Popokvil check travel news and lots of floods so places
        shut off Karma traders great rooftop food bar, ping pong more social
        space than bedrooms Bus bike hire, closer to town Poker turn right at
        end of road over bridge then follow signs fro sikouville will see sign
        for popokvil Waterfall being huge hotel (bad reviews for np but worth
        it) go left in trees or jungle for better views Bunker hill station very
        creepy especially in clouds Maps, me has lots of viewpoints Suppose to
        be able to see vietanme but too cloudy for us Touch clouds face to face
        couldn’t see anything else sheer drop down On way ups missed huge stage
        but cleared up on way down, saw blue skies and starts and moon in one
        Road is best in Cambodia, very smooth and no pot holes compared to other
        roads Fuel at top look on maps me Going to go Koh long but flooded so
        went back to Phnom Penh to get bus to Siem reps Extras kep yoga rabbit
        island paddle boarding Next day secret lake, shows you camobia
        countryside, roads are burnt orange, cute cafe Khmer root really good
        lime shakes peppers chicken, pepper only thing they export? Floods so
        entrain blocked, road through huge puddle hoping for best. Fell off bike
        coming back cos so slippy There took 1.5 hours with pot holes Arcadia
        waterpark had funny signs bar lots od=f drinking sociable staff from all
        over the world Quiet during flood first say opened so watched super rob
        projector as drinking game, offer tours too To get to Siem reap, small
        van back to Phnom Penh not good on road, cramped little air con 4 hours
        then big bus to Siem reap, people sat on plastic seats in aisle 10 hour
        said but took 14 with stop Siem reap Go day before 5pm to get Angkor was
        tickets Get access to temples for sunset and next day then don’t wait in
        queue at 5am for tickets and miss chance at good view for sunrise Bus
        took long arrived at 10pm read lots saying miss sunrise but ticket
        office opens at 4:30 to queue then sales start just before 5, queued for
        5 mins max and was at angora for 5:10. Less busy as monsoon so try get
        early if other time of year, opens at 5am Say all done in monsoon season
        if any differences check Got a spot at edge of lake on left side, less
        busy as hidden filled up want front for reflection After researching bus
        to Bangkok giant ibis best bet, scams on others about being left at
        border more pricey but best bus you’ll get, took out rows for extra leg
        room, food and guide Nearly missed bus always be at least 30 mins early
        didn’t pick us up from hostel so was suppose to get shuttle bus to main
        bus, left early Lots of breakfast places Some people walk past lake to
        get photos at temple but annoying to be in other peoples photos Not the
        best sunrise as cloudy, get 3 day pass if want best photo Got off bus at
        station and lots of tuk tuk drivers offering tour, $20 for day, ticket
        extra, didn’t ask us for money from lift to hostel and paid for both
        next day after the tour asked to be picked up 4:20 but was at hostel
        sleeping in tuk tuk at 3:30 Took us Angkor was waited and went back at 8
        then baton, got lost as came out wrong way twice, waited two hours for
        us, then tac prom, gave us two hours but only took 30 min $37 one day
        get 3 or 7 days don’t have to be consecutive Somnang was name Cambodia
        much more expensive $5 atm fee, vietnam 70p May be better to start at
        baton and work back so less tourists, part go Angkor only one after 9
        Hostel auntys/uncles but have to pay extra for toilet roll and hot water
        etc

gojek, grab, bluebird but not liked Canggu by grab from denpasser,

        150,000 for hour drive Hostel Hangfive pool kitchen clean all the time

        good English owner Walk to berawa 30 min black sand service charges but

        good for surfing Got a grab bike to Tanah lot, most ask for more after

        booking, say you will be stranded and say will wait for you, sunset best

        time, harder to get back to be fair only locals but taxis available for

        not much more 100,000 bluebird to mengwi bus station, men at car as soon

        as we got there asking for bus, brought to a bus and hoped right one,

        asked some people on it Left at 9 but got there at 7:30 waited til it

        was full charged 100,000 including ferry probably cheaper at office Bus

        to gilimanuk ferry then banyuwangi 4 hour bus 30 min ferry nice views

        Only thing we did in java crazy driving or get private taxi around £30

        one way Ljen volcano bed and breakfast Tour 100,000 picked up midnight

        1.5 for top 0.5 down to crater to see blue fire Rare anywhere elsewhere

        Little underwhelming and small for how dangerous and tiring trek down is

        Become really popular so many tourists clambering down Sulphur pushes up

        through cracks Lots coming down still one way harder going up Sunrise

        amazing, not typical, whole sky turns pink, don’t actually see sun, blue

        crater comes out of nowhere turquoise no idea it was there going down

        Northerner in me wore shorts got there and got weird looks sold hats

        glove etc rented jackets stuck it out and actually got really warm

        walking up was really cold at start though Gas mask included wear around

        sulphur Once sunrises warm again Tour took us back to ferry port Soon as

        we got out the car people came over asking where we were going took us

        to cafe on side of road and said 30 mins to bus but waited 2 hours, had

        chance to get food at supermarket next door or from cafes 100,000 back

        but so packed, already loads of Indonesian on board, didn’t care too

        much got a seat back corner and slept whole time Got back to station and

        another bluebird to ubud about 3pm Tour guide putu tag insta £40 monkey

        forest in ubud extras Tellalang rice, coffee plant try all different

        flavours, jungle swing, nests Holy spring temple learn about culture,

        get a blessing, says not religion but tradition, everyone should have a

        goal, work towards it, time to reflect on it, make a personal wish at

        fountain Waterfall after, good photo from friend, bought iPhone from

        money to give people best experience Organised batur for us too and

        boats (if not hostels do it) bagger much easier to get to, different

        experience Gates fake loads of queues Leave early, 1 hour to bottom in

        car but get chocolate pancakes on the way Whole round sun, red haze

        orange two volcanoes Active crater but other is like nothing you’ve ever

        seen Batur lake really pretty see on way down when sun has risen see

        steam from volcano and monkeys Got picked up at 11am got back to hostel

        at 10am to go to boats Ferry is loads cheaper from Sanur but takes

        longer Got to Padang bai for fast boats cost 450,000 return to Gili air

        Chose gili air as suppose to be mix of Gili t party and chilled romantic

        Gili meno So many people at harbour not knowing which boat Bali time

        Look for other people wearing same badge or ask women selling stuff lots

        of snacks Boat comes best to ask Check in 30 mins early, boat comes any

        amount of time after Stops gili t then Gili air then lombok? Don’t leave

        valuables in backpack thrown on and get wet Went semaya one 1.5 hours

        take sickness tablets again slept from batur Gili t was so chill one

        place has stuff going on for night time small enough to walk or bike no

        cars, there’s horses but not nice to ride Beach always a walk away

        surrounds island can do 4 day 3 night loomed but stopping January Lots

        of swings don’t have to queue like Gili t Hostile Hello lumb Cheapest we

        found sp noce, began banana chocolate pancakes free every morning

        couldn’t do more for you but everywhere on the island looks amazing

        pools beach view Best part aunty, always checking we were fed and

        watered gave us papaya from garden All vegan couldn’t tell To do

        Snorkelling turtle haven, sculptures but far too many people, coral,

        last stop saw more turtles some on surface Sat on top and got badly

        sunburnt only 100,000 book with people on street near aunties Stop on

        meno for lunch Wednesday legends bar great for sunset First night cloudy

        so didn’t see much then all of a sudden the sky went purple Live music

        whole time 6-10pm we were there yogi tag first then band joined him]fire

        show through then dj after Second night has sunset near swings then

        outdoor cinema but got cancelled Fast boat back to Padang then Nusa

        penida 300,000 return including shuttle to Kuta but loads of places had

        them at padangbai too Boat less than one hour lots quicker, Jose right

        near harbour so good location, watch sunset from balcony Nice cheap good

        family, restaurant/bike/tour around Reluctantly got bikes after hearing

        how dangerous it is and already fell but ran out of money and tours

        expensive Bike 80,000 but tours more comfortable and probably get to see

        more if pushed for time Made map of island with saved points to locate

        to each (make) large island takes long time to navigate Day 1 Atuh

        beach, diamond beach next to each other could’ve spent whole day here

        Rushed cheap version Road there was mostly okay windy and thing but

        paved well, narrow so careful of cars steep edge Then take turn off and

        turns to gravel and pot holes Steep hills take it very slow loads fall

        off, from hostel 1.5hours First see diamond Beach to right can walk down

        to it atuh further walk down bean bags food More touristy diamond

        untouched on way back turning to tree house very nice headed to s beach

        but roads looked bad and had little time and worse back up so went p

        waterfall Beaut hire sarong 15000 walk blue stairs to greenery sunset

        blessing, hot springs not hot Beautiful view chill in pool after hike

        waterfall fake hike back up to sunset points handmade 5,000 crazy to see

        what you’ve just climbed biked back in dark so make sure you know how to

        use lights not best as if car comes hard Stuffed with pizza and pasta

        after took 1.5 hours back but all road, maps always wrong and have to go

        in to get to coast again Atm not reliable good to have enough cash or

        cash converter but not best rate. Looked manta ray snorkelling through

        guy near hostel 8am-10:30am 200,000 manta point lots of them swim

        towards you huge Follow them swimming away then turn round and swim

        towards you Careful of boots Got back and set off again to kelingking

        about 1pm on the way lots of tours coming opposite way so missed the

        rush apparently norm ally lots of queues even sign post for it but we

        didn’t wait Walked down to first viewpoint good photo of tree head and

        can go further but long walk and after other walks and snorkelling

        couldn’t hack it lots of janky steep paths on island Drive mostly Olay

        paved road but some bumpy gravel was glad not to go back this way headed

        to broken beach but got to more bad roads and map said 30 mins for car

        which is longer so went to crystal bay instead 1hour but roads good need

        more days really got back to padangbai then went to office on corner and

        got shuttle to kuta Ate burritos watched last sunset but not good too

        many tourists party place for Aussies had amazing accai bowl More Lovina

        for dolphins, komodo, flores Hostel was Berlin but not good but

        everything else booked and only few hours before flight 15 minutes form

        airport taxi cheap then to Singapore and home

Flew to Singapore by plane, arrive at Jewel Changi Airport The airport
        has the worlds largest indoor waterfall known as rain vortex, 40m high
        and surrounded by terraced forest Hostel: Little red dot, arrived and
        was told we’d been upgraded, one free upgrade a day, got room with tv
        screen at end of bed enclosed by curtains, free breakfast was toast,
        staff lovely (Mas) To do: DNA bridge, good views of city skyline Gardens
        by the bat, skybridge cost 8.50 sgd Extras: flower dome, cloud forest
        but costs more than we budgeted for Sentosa: beautiful beaches, vr room,
        universal world, indoor skydive Padawan get to most southern point of
        Asia/siloso beach Bungy - Aj Hacket $159 don’t book photos online,
        cheaper to buy after get videos and photos $69 both Bungy at sunset
        goof, garden by bay at night, light show 7:45pm and 8:45pm, haji lane at
        night, graffiti live music Mexican food piedra negra, we got the funk
        bar music played football game

Only north since monsoon Arrived in Bangkok 7pm, got on ibis at 8am Lots
        of traffic and long queue in immigration Went to train station, got
        train at 10pm, only 3rd class left, Hualamphang but only £7 After
        already travelling 12 hours, this was bad, would’ve stayed in Bangkok if
        wasn’t rushing Grab to mcdonalds while waiting, third class no beds just
        one seat but can pull down big window and really nice views of the
        jungle People jump on at stops shouting about food, one guy on whole
        journey with hot food not sure where he got it from and hot water
        noodles etc he didn’t sleep either Whole journey 28 jours was grim
        Hostel: mapping, room smelt weird but cute huts at bottom of garden
        facing river and had kitchen and fridge for first time as travelling
        Night bazaar only 10 min walk, best market been to, have everything
        including boxing, cabaret, handmade stuff, street food sat/sun best we
        went Saturday Elephant jungle paradise sanctuary, two families, 3
        generations, two mums, grandma, 2 years, 4 months Cared for, free to
        wander, no chains or riding, amazing lunch enough for 10 next to
        waterfall Did full day, so much better afternoon group had over 12
        people all crowded round Fed elephants, walking into jungle, made herbal
        medicine, mud bath cleaned in waterfall Free quality photos Elephants
        seemed really happy Local tribe, one person per big elephant Money from
        tourists feeds them as eat 250kg? Separate male elephants attack babies
        of other families Oldest is leader, similar lifespan to us Don’t sleep
        much need time to eat as big See us as puppies, trusted us immediately,
        tribe communicates with them without touching Pai Read bad reviews about
        bus to pai, went with Aya boded though hostel 200 for pick up from
        hostel, 150 otherwise, roads are very windy from half way but got sick
        tablets from chemist close to market Got 12 for 40 3.5 hour journey
        including stop at cafe, cheap good smoothies Pai very cute hippy town
        surrounded by greenery and mountains Hostel Mountain view guest house Up
        high so free pick up, staff lovely, owner is English wife thai, loads to
        do, lots of people stay longer than expected, better than Chiang mai but
        scams, police charged 400 for not having an international license so
        avoid station Get insurance on bike and look for one with personal
        whatever May have to inform them you’re using it Some places in pai
        aren’t covered as hard to moped Avoid steep hills if not experienced,
        can always leave moped at bottom Hill to mupai viewpoint very steep
        Patang waterfall after bamboo bridge not insured if from shop? 20 min
        walk from waterfall Locals so nice, had trouble on bike and all helped
        round china village, kickstand flipped round To do Canyon pretty all the
        time, bamboo and land split closes? Good for sunset but busy Big buddha
        walking street has so much cheap nice food avoid going in a sit down
        restaurant Live music Walk down first and see what you want Near
        viewpoint is may hang waterfall slide down rocks Dang on street so good
        and cheap exception to sit down place Tubing Hot springs 80 degrees at
        top Walk further and can go in gets cooler start at 37 degrees nice but
        already hot can’t spend too long and entrance 300 Massage at muang par
        thai massage only 150 for tai massage hour Bus back to Chiang man stayed
        at tiger hostel for one night better location went to smaller market 40
        baht tiger took us airport 150 together

Hostels: no kitchens, tend to leave bags in room not very secure but
        free, curtains 3G works on three, lots of wifi, Vietnamese dong, roads
        crazy, lots on people on one moped Flew from Singapore to noi bai, £100
        each one way in august late notice Paid for bags at airport, apparently
        cheaper if big at counter over 4 hours before but counter only open at
        certain times 20 sgd for 20kg we shared weight 3.5 hours vietjet air Got
        a taxi but could get bus, taxis very cheap Roads very scary Didn’t find
        too much to do, one full day enough for us, booked ha long bay tour
        through hotel but cancelled, gave us money back, essential to find
        company who will give money back especially in monsoon season, storm
        whipha Ticket said no refund in case of storm but meant except for storm
        $90 usd for 2 days 1 night singh cafe Hostel camellia, staff lovely
        Night time Hoan Kiem Lake and turtle tower Railway street night and day,
        old quarter, tour cancelled so tried to book train via 12.go but needs
        Vietnamese card and more expensive online but good with dsvn to show
        trains Not all shown, more at station Also on 12.go can’t book on day
        needs to be day before Went to train station, next available at 2:30pm
        sleeper so went back to railway street and railway cafe, for banh mi and
        egg coffee Ling so nice, great to be at when train goes, timetable?
        Indoor large window but better to be out, was first place on this
        street, ‘bridged tourists, locals and trains’ free English lessons for
        local kids/elders, family run business, CHOO CHOO Lived there since 1983
        Didn’t plan properly, on train to hoi an but wanted phong nha so ending
        up getting off at dong hoi at 1am, definitely don’t do if on own. Plan
        times. Don’t like you being in train station f no ticket so we walked
        across town to bus station 15 min walk, was closed and dark and some
        random man came up to us lifting bricks so we went back to train station
        and sat in corner hoping no one would notice us til 5am. Stock up on
        snacks for these situations Sleeper train has hot water for noodles, one
        charger point so good to have extension, cold due to air-con so have
        jumper. Stop not clear, opposite bus station but not shelter just a sign
        next to noodle stand Suppose to be 5:30 but 5:20 grey mini bus came,
        read about this happening online and more expensive but get there
        quicker so we got on. 50,000? Phong nha Atm max 3mil, fee much less than
        other countries, bring more money with you Nguyen shack food amazing
        pancakes fruit eggs rustic Bunk beds separated by thin sheet of board
        with curtain at front very eco friendly, partner has pool for free Tiger
        much more sociable down road, live music 8pm more people, good to go at
        night for drinks Food capture, lots of western , next door but one, m
        granola, Heinz beans, choose your own pizza Park best place to learn
        mopeds, roads quiet except for a few rogue cows, especially compared to
        city Dogs cows chickens roaming about Said 2 things a day, got ready for
        8:30 so fit botanic gardens, route 2 skip high bit if in rush and go up
        to view point from junction between view point and waterfall instead
        Paradise cave and dark cave, moped to all if not can get taxi About
        50-60km for all and back to centre Botanic need bug spray Paradise
        choice of buggy to het to start of walk or 20 min walk then hike up
        stairs 57-m feels more as vertical Dark cave bring swimsuit (can only
        wear this) put stuff in lockers, says shuts at 4 but last entry 3, we
        stayed til 5 Biplane across river, go in cave, mud bath, kayak back,
        choice of obstacle course Next day sleep in and chilled at pool. Pub
        with cold beer, janky ladders give nice view duckstop become duck
        leaders Hostel sorted bus to hue/da nang, hard to sleep cos they love to
        beep, got on and empty but so many people got on and people slept in
        aisle, Norma, don’t have fully booked? 150,000/200,000 buses can be late
        good le maps not accurate Hostel in Sanand was Lagom, tiny cats, not
        place on maps but taxi driver knew where it was Private bathroom per
        room, curtqin, lockers under bed, near beach Bikini bottom amazing
        breakfast acacia bowls, full english, pancakes, nachos, tacos, b burgers
        Marble mountains, got there 5:40 closed at 5:30 Locals try get you to
        pace in their space for. Afee so don’t be surprised when locals start
        shouting at you Identify you as tourist, charged 10,000 for one bike but
        usually 5,000 Went to beach for sunset instead Rode scooter to lady
        buddha need expertise Laundry 20/30k per kg Pack charger, extension,
        case for pillow, water bag, tupperware for noodles or oats, spoon/fork
        Can bike hue to da nang as part of hai van pass, were didn’t cos of big
        bags Hai van pass Pass fine not busy but da nang centre was hectic,
        maybe less busy on pass cos monsoon but I felt fine driving Not
        confident get a tour someone will drive or look for another route
        abounding centre, maybe long beach to avoid traffic Or get bus/taxi to
        bike rental closer to start if possible CHECK WHEN THINGS CLOSE Left at
        9 and got back at 5 so leave early Stops : French bunkers, viewpoint x2,
        all on maps me viewpoints, Langco beach has floating restaurant,
        elephant springs Can pull up anywhere if sensible and not too busy on
        pass Viewpoint shows fishing boats etc tips gear reference Langco offers
        free parking if buy from them Elephant springs follow maps to get to
        motorway do u turn to get to other side of road then down a small road
        Keep following maps til get to ticket place Very refreshing in heat
        15000 pp 2000 pm50,000 for hut Xomdond comes up to you leads to their
        space but go left for music and people jumping in form rocks, quieter to
        right to chill in springs Did same on way back, more photo ops on way
        there if going da nang to hue as on right side of road Got public bus 33
        to hoi ann, maps said 2 hour but only 30 mins, coudve got a taxi for bit
        extra From da nang centre to bus station in hoi ann, bus early left
        arunf 6pm, buses end early, every 20 mins, man ran down street after us
        saw we had bags to get us on busm, very efficient, pulled us on bus
        ruthless people gummed on and bus buys barely stops 10000 each? Hostels
        offers car for 250,000 each much more comfortable Hoi an cIty of
        lanterns Qua Trac waterwheel highlight Hostel sun lake homestay but
        room, ‘broke’ so changed us to go modo red ceramic staff picked us up on
        moped Got to ctnryside by bike (met us at hostel, brought 3 biked with
        her on own) took on starwboat to coconut tree in river, ‘uncle’ made us
        straw hats and had a buffalo ride, $39 but did farming, cook, leg
        massafe, thuang came to get us, biked to market, said no fish wasn’t a
        problem, got tofu and chose the fruit Jessie sister did our cooking
        class, such a good humour, British humpior, gave drink with goodly eyes
        told us frog eggs so didn’t drink it turns out seeds for garden basil
        maybe Given recipes and grater as gift 4 dishes then foot head shoulder
        back massage, let us take books back to hostel and they picked up later
        Hostel sorted pick up back to da nag as train station here Tailor in hoi
        ann, gold silk, show then picture of something you want and they make it
        ready for next ay, market other side of river, leave space in suitcase
        for clothes, lots of cheap food stalls, rice paper papers, banana
        pancakes BARTER HARD, bag should one 250,000 got it for 100,000 as one
        zip broke Ho Chi Minh No train station, get bus/atxi./car to da nang
        train station then sleeper, took over 20 hours Cuchi tunnels, pink
        church, walking street, lots of roofs top bars, very licecely nights, go
        for a night out, people on street try pull you inn, Food Bombay get free
        drink leaving review, £7 for curry, rice, naan cider Hostel Aloha siagon
        don’t recommend absolutely basics but $2 Bus to Phnom Penh Sorry bus
        near hostel $10 6 hours, staff on board so helpful clean, guide you
        through immigration Stop for lunch at immigration lace Fb Phnom Penh
        sorta bus Put $1 in passport so don’t wait in line, need two print off
        of visa Ladies there to exchange left over money and decent rate but
        check first 2 hours late, depends how many people have visa or getting
        it there, we got evisa online Extra vietnam, ha Giang loop, go papa
        hostel to do trek in sapa, ha long bay, weather not great August with
        floods cancellations but less busy. Hoi an knock offs

Route: Singapore - Hanoi - Phong nha - Da nang - Hoi an - Ho chi Minh -
        Phnom Penh - Kampot - Koh rong - Siem reap - Bangkok - Chiang mai - Pai
        - Bangkok - Bali - Java - Bali - Gili t - Bali - Singapore
